notes.author: ben
notes.text: Research confirmed: LOB is a real acronym cruisers use. Forum posts show DIY solutions (numbered bins, spreadsheets). No good app exists.

notes.author: nick
notes.text: Offline-first sync is harder than it looks â€” need to research CRDTs or simpler alternatives.

notes.author: ben
notes.text: Have 10 users who want to try this out and will pilot it for us.

notes.author: ben
notes.text: would be hard to use withotu tinternet on the high seas
